Notes: Battery life on each device depends on the sensor batch queue size, which allows the app to keep the watch in standby most of the time and still collect all data.

150 events sensor batch queue which allows very low battery consumption. There are issues with refurbished Gear Live devices with a dev version of the OS which do not connect to with Sleep as Android. Re-flashing of the firmware as described here should resolve the issue.

You need:
- an addon for phone
- a watch app called “Sleep as Android – Native Gear Companion”.
You need the Fitbit app
